org.fcrepo.kernel.services

Class VersionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.AbstractService
        • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.VersionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes, org.fcrepo.kernel.services.Service, org.fcrepo.kernel.services.VersionService

    @Component
public class VersionServiceImpl
extends AbstractService
implements org.fcrepo.kernel.services.VersionService
    This service exposes management of node versioning. Instead of invoking the JCR VersionManager methods, this provides a level of indirection that allows for special handling of features built on top of JCR such as user transactions.
    Author:
    Mike Durbin

    • Method Detail

      • nodeUpdated

        public void nodeUpdated(javax.jcr.Session session,
               String absPath)
                 throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Notifies the version manager that the node at a given path was updated so that if automatic versioning is set for that node, a version checkpoint will be made. When a node object is available, use of nodeUpdated(javax.jcr.Node) will save the overhead of a redundant node lookup.
        Specified by:
        nodeUpdated in interface org.fcrepo.kernel.services.VersionService
        Parameters:
        session -
        absPath - the absolute path to the node that was created or modified
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException

      • nodeUpdated

        public void nodeUpdated(javax.jcr.Node n)
                 throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Notifies the version manager that the given node was updated so that if automatic versioning is set for that node, a version checkpoint will be made.
        Specified by:
        nodeUpdated in interface org.fcrepo.kernel.services.VersionService
        Parameters:
        n - the node that was updated
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException

                   throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException

        Specified by:

      • checkpoint

        public void checkpoint(javax.jcr.Node node)
                throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Creates a version checkpoint for the given node if versioning is enabled for that node type. When versioning is enabled this is the equivalent of VersionManager#checkpoint(node.getPath()), except that it is aware of TxSessions and queues these operations accordingly.
        Specified by:
        checkpoint in interface org.fcrepo.kernel.services.VersionService
        Parameters:
        node - the node for whom a new version is to be minted
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException

        Specified by:
        setTxService in interface org.fcrepo.kernel.services.VersionService
        Parameters:
        txService - the txService to set
